data.title: AIBC Summit 2022 - Africa
data.meta_description: SIGMA hosts AIBC Summit 2022 - Africa on 22 Mar 2022 12:00pm EDT. Location: TBA, Cape Town, South Africa
data.text:
As the geographical, political, and linguistic distinctions reflect considerably on Africa's landscape, we decided to have not one but three host cities. AIBC Africa will rotate every year: in 2022 we're heading to the vibrant city of Cape Town in South Africa for the inaugural summit, AIBC Africa will then fly West to Ghana the following year and in 2024 East to Kenya.
